title: Introducing the $\sigma$-Cell: Unifying GARCH, Stochastic Fluctuations and Evolving Mechanisms in RNN-based Volatility Forecasting. (arXiv:2309.01565v1 [q-fin.CP])
abstract: This paper introduces the $\sigma$-Cell, a novel Recurrent Neural Network (RNN) architecture for financial volatility modeling. Bridging traditional econometric approaches like GARCH with deep learning, the $\sigma$-Cell incorporates stochastic layers and time-varying parameters to capture dynamic volatility patterns. Our model serves as a generative network, approximating the conditional distribution of latent variables. We employ a log-likelihood-based loss function and a specialized activation function to enhance performance. Experimental results demonstrate superior forecasting accuracy compared to traditional GARCH and Stochastic Volatility models, making the next step in integrating domain knowledge with neural networks.

translated_title: 引入$\sigma$-Cell：在基于RNN的波动率预测中统一GARCH，随机波动和演化机制
translated_abstract: 本文介绍了一种新颖的基于循环神经网络（RNN）的金融波动率建模方法，即$\sigma$-Cell。通过将传统经济计量方法（如GARCH）与深度学习相结合，$\sigma$-Cell通过添加随机层和时变参数捕捉动态波动模式。我们的模型作为一个生成网络，近似条件潜变量的分布。我们采用基于对数似然的损失函数和专门的激活函数来提高性能。实验结果表明，与传统的GARCH和随机波动模型相比，我们的模型具有更高的预测准确性，这是将领域知识与神经网络集成的下一步。
tldr: 这种新的RNN架构$\sigma$-Cell融合了传统的GARCH方法和深度学习，通过加入随机层和时变参数来准确预测金融波动率，实验结果显示其优于传统的GARCH和随机波动模型，对于集成领域知识与神经网络有重要意义。
en_tdlr: The $\sigma$-Cell is a novel RNN architecture that combines traditional GARCH methods and deep learning to accurately forecast financial volatility by incorporating stochastic layers and time-varying parameters. Experimental results demonstrate its superiority over traditional GARCH and Stochastic Volatility models and its significance in integrating domain knowledge with neural networks.
